title: Add 2 vaults with 5% deposit fee and 4-year EMBER lock vault
content:
Economic impact

1. Add BCH/flexUSD vault with 5% deposit fee.

2. Add lawUSD/flexUSD vault with 5% deposit fee.

3. Add 4-year lock EMBER vault with extra treasury reward. 

  

Impact on users

1. Fees from lawUSD/flexUSD and BCH/flexUSD will be used weekly to buyback EMBER in treasury.

2. EMBER from the treasury will be distributed to the 4-year lock EMBER vault. Calculated on a 4 year basis, giving daily 1/1460 of EMBER on treasury.

  

Expected impact

1. Getting liquidity and volatility on bch/flexUSD and lawUSD/flexUSD.

2. Having 5% deposit fees on them and use the fees for weekly EMBER buyback on treasury.

3. Use the EMBER that is being bought back from market through fees to reward the 4-year lock EMBER

Moon

  

Expected positive impact

Lambo
options: Yes - discuss and update some params
